aka: Now He Is in the Truth

writer.name: 罗伯托·塔拉索纳 Roberto Tarazona

director.name: 罗伯托·塔拉索纳 Roberto Tarazona

this_title: Now He Is in the Truth and We Are Still in the Lie
trans_title: Now He Is in the Truth
introduction: A camera wanders through the Cuban countryside, a liminal space in which ghostly voices speak of the lost taste of fried bullfrogs, while the blinding light of faith struggles to fully illuminate an evanescent peasantry. An echo postponed.
chinese_title: Now He Is in the Truth and We Are Still in the Lie
